      Subclasses of TokenTagger in it.jrc.lt.core.component.flatpatternmatcher 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicTokenTagger
      This is a very basic token tagger that assigns one or more token classes to a given token

      This is an extended token tagger that assigns one or more token classes to a given token

      Methods in it.jrc.lt.core.component.flatpatternmatcher with parameters of type TokenTagger 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<AbstractDisjunctionOfFlatPatternMatcherItems> BasicFlatPatternMatcher.findMatch(java.util.ArrayList<AbstractTokenItem> tokens, char[] inputText, TokenTagger tagger) 
      abstract java.util.ArrayList<AbstractDisjunctionOfFlatPatternMatcherItems> AbstractFlatPatternMatcher.findMatch(java.util.ArrayList<AbstractTokenItem> tokens, char[] inputText, TokenTagger tagger)
      Applies the flat pattern matcher to a given input text, and returns an array list of disjunctions of flat pattern matcher items, where each such disjunction represents a match (possibly with more than one reading) in the input text at a given position.
      java.util.ArrayList<AbstractDisjunctionOfFlatPatternMatcherItems> AbstractFlatPatternMatcher.findMatch(java.util.ArrayList<AbstractTokenItem> tokens, java.lang.String inputText, TokenTagger tagger)
      Applies the flat pattern matcher to a given input text, and returns an array list of disjunctions of flat pattern matcher items, where each such disjunction represents a match (possibly with more than one reading) in the input text at a given position.
